document_title: Finger arthritis: Causes, signs, treatment and prevention
subsection_content:
Whether painful and swollen finger joints are dangerous or not will depend on the causative factors and the current severity of the disease. Regardless of the cause of finger arthritis, if not treated promptly, it can lead to dangerous hand complications including: (3)
Temporary loss of motor function; Joint stiffness; Muscle atrophy and joint deformity; Disabled
